Package game.body.walkers.steplisteners

Interface MobStepListenerFrame

All Superinterfaces:
EventListener, city.cs.engine.StepListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
AggressiveStepListener, MobStepListener, PassiveStepListener
public interface MobStepListenerFrame extends city.cs.engine.StepListener
Interface for the StepListener, used to implement WalkerBehaviour
Since:
03-03-2025
Author:
Alexander Smolowitz, alexander.smolowitz@city.ac.uk

    • isPlayerInRange

      boolean isPlayerInRange(org.jbox2d.common.Vec2 pos, boolean playerBehind)
      Checks if mob is in range of player
      Parameters:
      pos - the position of the mob
      playerBehind - boolean value for if the player is behind the mob
      Returns:
      true if the mob is in range, false otherwise

    • patrolArea

      void patrolArea(org.jbox2d.common.Vec2 pos)
      Has the mob walk within a given range, and change its direction if it reaches the edge of the range. Handles any additional logic to the patrol
      Parameters:
      pos - the position of the mob

    • nearViewX

      boolean nearViewX(float mobX, float radiusX)
      Checks if the player is within radiusX of the mob
      Parameters:
      mobX - the x position of the mob
      radiusX - the radius to check for
      Returns:
      true if the player is within radiusX, false otherwise

    • nearViewY

      boolean nearViewY(float mobY, float radiusY)
      Checks if the player is within radiusY of the mob
      Parameters:
      mobY - the y position of the mob
      radiusY - the radius to check for
      Returns:
      true if the player is within radiusY, false otherwise
